channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 20:59 Air alert in Kyiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 20:59 Air alert in Kyiv region. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 15:53 ​​FREE EVACUATION We ask that you urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24/7 FREE hotline for civilian evacuation - 0800339291
